mapper.select: select b.uId id,b.uName userName,a.portrait portrait,b.uTime totalTime,b.uScore currentTime,c.name university,b.uMotto motto from tbl_position a,tbl_self_user b,tbl_indexcollege c where a.lat=#{lat} and a.lng=#{lng} and b.uName=a.username and c.id IN(select sId from tbl_self_schools_favorite where uId= a.id) limit 1

select b.uId id,b.uName userName,b.uAvatar portrait,b.uTime totalTime,b.uScore currentTime,c.name university,b.uMotto motto from tbl_position a,tbl_self_user b,tbl_indexcollege c where a.username=#{name} and b.uName=a.username and c.id IN(select sId from tbl_self_schools_favorite where uId= a.id) limit 1
